name: Lua LSP
description: Lua language server for Claude Code, providing code intelligence and diagnostics.
longDescription: Integrates `lua-language-server` for Lua files (`.lua`). Provides code intelligence, completions, and diagnostics. Install via `brew install lua-language-server` (macOS), `snap install lua-language-server` (Ubuntu), `pacman -S lua-language-server` (Arch), `dnf install lua-language-server` (Fedora), or pre-built binaries from GitHub releases.
